messages.content:
{"long_recall_output":null,"non_recall_output":"","short_recall_output":{"analysis":"C。事实细节题。女士问男士是否愿意和她一起去看电影，男士说今晚有作业要做。女士说那明天去。男士同意。","discourse":"W: Would you like to go to the movies with me?
M: I have homework to do tonight.
W: How about tomorrow?
M: OK.","level":"B","question":"When will they go to the movies?
A. Tonight.
B. Tomorrow.
C. Not decided.","question_types":"短对话","source":"自编"}}
